scripts.dev: ./bin/generate-ssl-options.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=. NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider node server.js
scripts.debug: NODE_ENV=development cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider node --inspect server.js
scripts.test:assets: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider mochapack 'test/assets/**/*.test.js' --webpack-config test/webpack.config.js --require @babel/register
scripts.test:all: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test yarn test && yarn test:assets && yarn test:smoke
scripts.test:smoke: yarn playwright install && cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run -c test/e2e/smoke.conf.js --grep @smoke --steps --verbose --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:evidence-upload: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run -c test/e2e/ --grep @evidence-upload --steps
scripts.test:mutation: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --all -c test/e2e/ --grep @functional --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:functional: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --all -c test/e2e/ --grep @functional --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:fullfunctional: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --all -c test/e2e/ --grep 'functional|fullFunctional' --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:e2e-pages: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run-multiple pages -c test/e2e/ --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:functional:batch: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run -c test/e2e/ --grep @batch-$BATCH --steps
scripts.test:functional:batches: for i in `seq -w 1 12`; do BATCH=$i yarn test:functional:batch; [ $? -ne 0 ] && exit $?; done; exit 0;
scripts.test:crossbrowser: yarn playwright install && cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=test codeceptjs run-multiple ${BROWSER_GROUP:-'--all'} -c test/e2e/saucelabs.conf.js --grep @crossbrowser --steps --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:a11y: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=a11y LOG_LEVEL=ERROR mocha --exit test/accessibility/a11y.js --exit --timeout 60000 --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=functional-output,reportFilename=a11y,inlineAssets=true,reportTitle=submit-your-appeal
